content: Here are some actions that the agent fails to perform in Minecraft. Please give the explanation of action execution failure according to the current inventory information of the agent.

Failed Action: mine({'iron_ore':1}, null); # step 5: mine 1 iron_ore without tool
Current Inventory: null
Because mining iron_ore needs to use the tool stone_pickaxe, but my inventory does not have stone_pickaxe. So I need to craft stone_pickaxe first.

Failed Action: craft({'stone_pickaxe':1}, {'cobblestone':3, 'stick':2}, 'crafting_table'); # step 1: craft 1 stone_pickaxe from 3 cobblestone and 2 stick, on crafting_table
Current Inventory: null
Because crafting stone_pickaxe needs to have 3 cobblestone and 2 stick in inventory, but my inventory does not have cobblestone and stick. So I need to mine cobblestone and craft stick first.

Failed Action: craft({'stick':4}, {'planks':2}, null); # step 3: craft 4 stick from 2 planks first
Current Inventory: null
Because crafting stick needs to have planks in inventory, but my inventory does not have planks. So I need to craft planks first.

Failed Action: mine({'cobblestone':3}, null); # step 4: mine 3 cobblestone without tool
Current Inventory: 7 planks, 8 stick
Because mining cobblestone need to use the tool wooden_pickaxe, but my inventory does not have wooden_pickaxe. So I need to craft wooden_pickaxe first.

Failed Action: craft({'wooden_pickaxe':3}, {'planks':3, 'stick':2}, null); # step 4: craft 1 wooden_pickaxe from 3 planks and 2 stick
Current Inventory: 14 planks, 4 stick
Because crafting wooden_pickaxe needs to use the tool crafting_table, but my inventory does not have crafting_table. So I need to craft 1 crafting_table first.

Failed Action: craft({'iron_pickaxe':1}, {'iron_ingot':3, 'stick':2}, 'crafting_table'); # step 11: craft 1 iron_pickaxe from 3 iron_ingot and 2 stick, on crafting_table
Current Inventory: 6 planks, 1 crafting_table, 1 wooden_pickaxe, 5 dirt, 1 stone_pickaxe, 12 cobblestone, 5 stone, 1 iron_ingot, 1 furnace

Because crafting iron_pickaxe needs to have 3 iron_ingot and 2 stick in inventory, but my inventory only has 1 iron_ingot, which is not enough for 3 iron_ingot. And my inventory does not have stick. So I need to smelt 2 iron_ingot and craft 2 stick first.
